content: I'm trying to implement definition-based extraction. Where can I find some example questionnaires+extraction results to test the implementation? Thanks!
happy new year everyone :) bumping this question. are there any examples for extraction? many thanks!
@Joee Garcia @Paul Lynch

I am not aware of any tools that currently support definition-based extraction. I know that LHC forms support Observation-based. (See https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIRI/SDC+Implementations). How about you @Paul?

thanks joee. we wouldn't mind being the first ;) are there any examples we can look at just to get us started? the examples for item controls (http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/sdc/examples.html#itemControl) are super useful. but i'm struggling to find examples to get us started with extraction.
@Brian Postlethwaite I know you've done some work on extraction, and I think it was definition-based?
There's 2 more there. But not sure where the structure defs are for those.
Commure has a few examples for use against our API implementation of definition-based extraction here, if that's helpful: https://developer.commure.com/docs/apis/sdc/examples
